General.Name: Saregama India Limited
General.Description: Saregama India Limited operates as an entertainment company in India and internationally. It operates through Music; Film, TV Serial and Events; and Publication segments. The company engages in manufacture and sale of music storage device through Carvaan, music card, audio compact discs, digital versatile discs. It also produces, sells, telecasts, and broadcast films and TV serials, and pre-recorded programs, as well as organize live musical events and deals with film rights; and operates publication business, which includes publishing of weekly current affairs magazines, and offers printing of printed materials, as well as marketing support services. In addition, the company provides music licensing including content procurement and production, content aggregation, and monetization; and retails music players with pre-loaded songs. Further, it offers concept creation, such as script reading and selection; pre-production including funding, cast selection, and scheduling; shooting and screenplay; post-production comprising editing, VFX, sound, and music services; and releases on theatrical and OTT platforms. The company was founded in 1902 and is headquartered in Mumbai, India. Saregama India Limited operates as a subsidiary of Composure Services Private Limited.
